ok...I hear the time the same..... I got amazing stuff when I recorded at that time later that evening....I will be taping tonight again at that time. 9:43 est. This also says the town I live in ..   Thanks Misty! The rest of the taping referred to "broadcasting" at that time...Please join me if you feel you want to.
monki

Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:                                  
Hiya Monki
   
  Sound file worked here (I think LOL). This is what came over my speakers anyway.
  "last count is at 9 start testing at 9xx"
  xx always =i dunno what they said there
   
  I think it was 9:43 but unsure.
  
Misty
monki rei <monkiintherabbithole@...> wrote:
      Hi everyone,
Im still new to this. Ive been recording for a year. I first started getting phone contact in the 80s but didnt know what was happening. This  time I did(well as much as I can) I am , like lunalamia, concerned for the greater good..although I have become fairly close to a couple of my other worldly friends. I look forward to learning and sharing. I am adding a small segmant of something from this last weekend.
monki

lunalamia <rainspirit1@...> wrote:      Just got this after I posted.
Thank you Misty...switching over to individual emails to get the links 
for evp sound files.

~ Laura (Lunalamia = yahoo)

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

> Hello to everyone that is joining our group. Feel free to jump in on 
the  conversations, ask questions or just look around. For those of you 
who would like to see what people are up to you may want to set your 
group settings to "individual email" settings for the postings 
otherwise you will not recieve message attachments of thier evp sound 
files. Most file sharing is done this way here.
> 
> Misty
